snippet: A semblance of calm returned to the city’s streets on Monday after a tense and at times frightening night, with numerous pro-democracy protesters and police officers injured as both sides vied for control of a road along the main government...
abstract: A semblance of calm returned to the city’s streets on Monday after a tense and at times frightening night, with numerous pro-democracy protesters and police officers injured as both sides vied for control of a road along the main government offices.

headline.main: The Scene as Police Sent Protesters Fleeing in Hong Kong
